sentences.sentence: Cardiac orifice mucosal laceration and oozing of blood were 73.9%, but without perforation and massive hemorrhage.
sentences.translation: 贲门黏膜撕裂、渗血占73.9%，但无穿孔和大出血。

sentences.sentence: Under general anesthesia or periotic nerve block anesthesia, 56 patients of auricle laceration underwent microsurgical debridement.
sentences.translation: 56例耳廓挫裂伤患者，在全麻或耳周神经阻滞麻醉下行显微清创缝合。

sentences.sentence: He had a laceration on his head.
